This.Is.40.DVDRip.350MB.x264.AAC~subtitled~[gWc]

Storyline:
Pete (Paul Rudd) shares a house with three females: wife Debbie (Leslie Mann), and their two daughters, eight-year-old Charlotte (Iris Apatow) and 13-year-old Sadie (Maude Apatow). To get some alone time, he hides in the bathroom with his tablet, or indulges by eating chocolate cupcakes.
Pete, who runs a struggling record label, and Debbie must figure out how to improve their relationship, which has turned into a confusion of arguments, confusion, lies and blame as they both approach 40
